Some of the time, when you introduced $z_j$ in your reasoning, it was unnecessary. For example, if $[ab] = [ac]$, then $[a][b] = [a][c]$, so $[a]([b] - [c]) = [0]$, so either $[a] = [0]$ or $[b] = [c]$. No use of $z_j$ necessary. Anyway, such reasoning is often more commonly written out using the "mod" notation.
